description: Allows a caller in a secure environment to assume a role with permission to access Amazon S3. In order to vend such credentials, Lake Formation assumes the role associated with a registered location, for example an Amazon S3 bucket, with a scope down policy which restricts the access to a single prefix. To call this API, the role that the service assumes must have lakeformation:GetDataAccess permission on the resource.

parameters.name: TableArn
parameters.description: The ARN identifying a table in the Data Catalog for the temporary credentials request.

parameters.name: Permissions
parameters.description: Filters the request based on the user having been granted a list of specified permissions on the requested resource(s). (string) ---

parameters.name: AuditContext
parameters.description: A structure representing context to access a resource (column names, query ID, etc). AdditionalAuditContext (string) --- The filter engine can populate the --AdditionalAuditContext' information with the request ID for you to track. This information will be displayed in CloudTrail log in your account.

nested_params.name: AdditionalAuditContext
nested_params.description: The filter engine can populate the --AdditionalAuditContext' information with the request ID for you to track. This information will be displayed in CloudTrail log in your account.

parameters.name: SupportedPermissionTypes
parameters.description: A list of supported permission types for the table. Valid values are COLUMN_PERMISSION and CELL_FILTER_PERMISSION. (string) ---

parameters.name: QuerySessionContext
parameters.description: A structure used as a protocol between query engines and Lake Formation or Glue. Contains both a Lake Formation generated authorization identifier and information from the request's authorization context. QueryId (string) --- A unique identifier generated by the query engine for the query. QueryStartTime (datetime) --- A timestamp provided by the query engine for when the query started. ClusterId (string) --- An identifier string for the consumer cluster. QueryAuthorizationId (string) --- A cryptographically generated query identifier generated by Glue or Lake Formation. AdditionalContext (dict) --- An opaque string-string map passed by the query engine. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_params.name: QueryId
nested_params.description: A unique identifier generated by the query engine for the query.

nested_params.name: QueryStartTime
nested_params.description: A timestamp provided by the query engine for when the query started.

nested_params.name: ClusterId
nested_params.description: An identifier string for the consumer cluster.

nested_params.name: QueryAuthorizationId
nested_params.description: A cryptographically generated query identifier generated by Glue or Lake Formation.

nested_params.name: AdditionalContext
nested_params.description: An opaque string-string map passed by the query engine.

nested_items.name: AccessKeyId
nested_items.description: The access key ID for the temporary credentials.

nested_items.name: SecretAccessKey
nested_items.description: The secret key for the temporary credentials.

nested_items.name: SessionToken
nested_items.description: The session token for the temporary credentials.

nested_items.name: Expiration
nested_items.description: The date and time when the temporary credentials expire.

nested_items.name: VendedS3Path
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 path for the temporary credentials.
